Vatnajökull National Park.title: Vatnajökull National Park
Vatnajökull National Park.byline: Vatnajökull National Park in Iceland is the second largest national park in Europe (the largest is Yugyd Va in Komi, Russia) and a natural world heritage site.

Vatakara.title: Vatakara
Vatakara.byline: Vatakara, Badagara or Vadagara is a town in the Kozhikode District of the Malabar region, in the state of Kerala, India.
